usage.headings: font-sans (Manrope for EN, Cairo for AR), font-bold, tracking-tight
usage.body: font-sans (Manrope for EN, Cairo for AR), text-base, leading-relaxed
usage.numbers: font-mono (JetBrains Mono) or font-sans with tabular-nums
usage.rtl_strategy: Use 'Cairo' for Arabic text. Ensure numbers remain in English format (Western Arabic numerals 0-9) even in RTL mode.

layout.spacing_system: Generous padding (p-6, p-8) for containers. Dense spacing (gap-2, gap-4) for data grids.

container_styles.pos_button: h-14 text-lg font-bold rounded-lg active:scale-95 transition-transform

inputs.default: h-12 bg-input border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary rounded-lg text-lg

visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-lg for floating elements, shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(0,0,0,0.5)] for modals
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use for sticky headers and overlays: bg-black/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-white/5
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the main background to reduce banding in dark mode.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is #fafafa or #e5e5e5 on dark backgrounds. Avoid dark gray text.
accessibility.touch_targets: Minimum 44px for all interactive elements in POS mode.

media.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for standard UI icons. Use 'phosphor-react' (Duotone) for larger feature icons if needed.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Apply the dark theme colors to 'index.css' immediately. The app should default to dark mode.
3. FONTS: Add the Google Fonts links to 'public/index.html' or import in CSS.
4. RTL: Implement a 'LanguageToggle' that switches the 'dir' attribute on the HTML tag between 'ltr' and 'rtl'.
5. LAYOUT: Build the Landing Page first with the split layout (POS vs Admin).
6. POS: Create the '/pos' route. Focus on the 'Terminal' layout: Sidebar (Cart) on Right (LTR) or Left (RTL), Grid (Menu) on the other side.
7. ADMIN: Create the '/admin' route with a sidebar navigation layout.
8. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn/UI logic but override styles to match the 'E1' dark/gold aesthetic. Do not use default Shadcn styles.
9. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
universal_guidelines: Avoid gradients for backgrounds; use solid dark colors with subtle borders.
Never use 'alert()' or native confirm dialogs. Use custom accessible modals.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA/WCAG AA).
Make sure the POS interface is touch-friendly (large buttons, no tiny links).
